description: Bolse 300Mbps Wireless-N USB Mini AdapterBolse mini 300Mbps Wireless USB Adapter offers maximum network range and speed, delivering up to 300Mbps of Internet connection over a wide coverage area. It guarantees a reliable and safe protection under a Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS), Plug and Play USB2.0 interface.Specifications- Add high-speed Wireless-N (draft 802.11n) Internet access to any USB enabled computer- Offers greater coverage than Wireless-G networks for internet access throughout your home or office- Works with older Wireless-G and Wireless-B networks- Operating distance of up to 300 feet indoor, and up to 900 feet in open space- Supports USB 2.0 interface, backward compatible to USB 1.1 and 1.2- Enhanced WEP and WPA wireless security for protected Internet access- Support System: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8; MAC OS X 10.5 Greater(*Does Not Support Win8.1*)- Wireless N speed up to 300Mbps and Backward compatible with 802.11b/g productsPackage Includes1 Wireless USB Adapter, 1 Driver Software CD, 1 User guide12 Month Manufacturer Warranty from Bolse**Note**- Windows 7/8 users can plug and play without the installation CD- Currently this adapter doesn't work with windows 8.1- Support Mac OS X 10.4 Greater- Won't work with Xbox 360, PS3, Blu-Ray, Roku, devices without operating systems (OS), or dual band routers only broadcasting N-speeds on 5GHz wavelengthPlease download the Mac Driver at the following Link: http://www.mybolse.com/support/Wireless/index.html#aa
title: Bolse® 300Mbps Wifi Wireless-N USB Micro Mini Adapter - Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8; Mac OS X 10.5 Greater; 2.4G 802.11ngb 32-Bit and 64-Bit Compatible(*Does Not Support Win8.1*)
